Package org.neo4j.logging.log4j

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LogExtended
    Extends the logging API with a few methods that are not part of the public API yet.
    Neo4jLogMessage
    Used to contain log4j to this maven module.
    StructureAwareMessage.FieldConsumer  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Log4jLog
    A Log implementation that uses the Log4j configuration the logger is connected to.
    Log4jLogProvider
    A LogProvider implementation that uses the Log4j configuration ctx is connected to.
    LogConfig  
    LogConfig.Builder  
    Neo4jJsonLogLayout  
    Neo4jJsonLogLayout.JsonFieldConsumer  
    Neo4jLoggerContext
    Facade for LoggerContext since LoggerContext is shaded in the logging module, and we can't depend directly on LoggerContext outside of the module.
    Neo4jLogLayout  
    RotatingLogFileWriter
    Should be used for files where rotation is required and the messages needs no additional formatting by the logging framework.
    StructureAwareMessage
    Base class for supporting structured logging.
